Package gate.event

Interface Summary
AnnotationListener A listener for events fired by an AnnotationSet (AnnotationSetEvent)
AnnotationSetListener A listener for events fired by an AnnotationSet (AnnotationSetEvent)
ControllerListener A listener for events generate by controllers.
CorpusListener A listener for events fired by Corpus
CreoleListener A listener for events fired by the CreoleRegister (CreoleEvent).
DatastoreListener A listener for DatastoreEvents.
DocumentListener A listener for document events (DocumentEvent).
FeatureMapListener The listenre for the toplevel events generated by the Gate system.
GateListener The listenre for the toplevel events generated by the Gate system.
ObjectModificationListener  
ProgressListener This interface describes objects that can register themselves as listeners to ProcessProgressReporters.
StatusListener This interface describes a listener that is interested in status events.
 

Class Summary
AnnotationEvent This class models events fired by an Annotation.
AnnotationSetEvent This class models events fired by an AnnotationSet.
ControllerEvent Events fired by controllers.
CorpusEvent Models events fired by corpora when documents are added or removed.
CreoleEvent Events related to the gate.creole package.
DatastoreEvent This class models events fired by datastores.
DocumentEvent This class models events fired by an Document.
GateEvent The top level event class for all the event types fired by the Gate system.
ObjectModificationEvent  
ProgressListenerAdaptor Convenience class for implementing ProgressListener
